name: Virtual Dream Center 1.2
description:
Virtual Dream Center is an online art center. 

"Virtual Dream Center 1.2" features the following virtual exhibitions :

BENOÎT AUBARD : “MAUVAISE PORTE”
LAURA PORTER, VALENTIN LEWANDOWSKI : “LA POSSIBILITÉ QUE JE M’APPELLE MOI MÊME”
LUKE ROGERS : “IN ORDER TO PRODUCE A REASONABLY CLEAR IMAGE”
TRH : “THE BOXMAKER”

www.virtualdreamcenter.xyz
